End-of-Term Tests start Tomorrow

Uncategorized  by MaxwellSeptember 18, 2013 




The Primary School English Programme students will be having their end-of-term EP tests on Thursday & Friday this week. Next week they will have their Thai test on Wednesday & Friday. The students have all been issued revision guidelines and test schedules and they should use these to prepare for their tests.
The Secondary School EP students will have their tests on Monday, Wednesday & Friday next week.
